name: Covid-19 Statistics
description: A Covid-19 tracker app built using Vue.

name: Conway Game of Life
description: An attempt to recreate the classic 1970s cellular evolution game using React.

name: 24 Hours of Earthquakes
description: Inspired by mobile apps installed on my phone in the past, the app tracks global earthquake activity from the last 24 hours and displays the data in a visual way using the Google Maps React Native plugin.

name: Table Tennis Tournament Generator
description: The app generates a table tennis tournament structure from a list of names provided by the user.

name: Login and Registration System
description: Generic user signup and login system including email verification, sessions, and password update functionality.

name: Film Guide
description: The app fetches daily Freeview film information from an API and displays the data in list and detail views.
